### Load packages and data

```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}

```

```{r load-data, message=FALSE}
nobel <- read_csv("data/nobel.csv")
```

## Exercises

Here is a link to the [lab instructions](https://datascience4psych.github.io/DataScience4Psych/lab03.html).

### Exercise 1

There are 935 observations and 26 variables. Each row represents a person/laureate. 

### Exercise 2

```{r nobel_living}
nobel_living <- nobel %>% filter(is.na(died_date), !is.na(country), gender != "org") #create new filtered df
```
